metadata.title: CVE-2024-44989 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:bonding: fix xfrm real_dev null pointer dereferenceWe shouldn't set real_dev to NULL because packets can be in transit andxfrm might call xdo_dev_offload_ok() in parallel. All callbacks assumereal_dev is set.
